question: Who is the author of the book titled 'Overdraft: Saving the Indian Saver'?
explanation:
Former Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Governor Urjit Patel has authored a book titled 'Overdraft: Saving the Indian Saver'.
The book is set to be released by the end of July 2020. The book focusses on the non-performing assets (NPAs) issue that has caused huge distress to the countryâ€™s banking sector. It also highlights the causes of NPAs and the efforts of Urjit Patel to deal with the issue as the Governor of RBI.
